## BitcoinsMoneypConnection interface

Information about a connection to the Moneyp protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BitcoinsMoneypConnection extends BitcoinsMoneypConnectionOptionalParams 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BitcoinsMoneypConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnectionoptionalparams.md)

## Remarks

Provided for debugging / informational purposes.

Exposed through [ReadableBitcoinsMoneyp.connection](./lib-ethers.readablebitcoinsmoneyp.connection.md) and [BitcoinsMoneyp.connection](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneyp.connection.md)<!-- -->.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addresses](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnection.addresses.md) | Record&lt;string, string&gt; | A mapping of Moneyp contracts' names to their addresses. |
|  [bootstrapPeriod](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnection.bootstrapperiod.md) | number | Time period (in seconds) after <code>deploymentDate</code> during which redemptions are disabled. |
|  [chainId](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnection.chainid.md) | number | Chain ID of the connected network. |
|  [deploymentDate](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnection.deploymentdate.md) | Date | Date when the Moneyp contracts were deployed. |
|  [provider](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnection.provider.md) | [BitcoinsProvider](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsprovider.md) | Bitcoins <code>Provider</code> used for connecting to the network. |
|  [signer?](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnection.signer.md) | [BitcoinsSigner](./lib-ethers.bitcoinssigner.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Bitcoins <code>Signer</code> used for sending transactions. |
|  [totalStabilityPoolMPReward](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnection.totalstabilitypoolmpreward.md) | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Total amount of MP allocated for rewarding stability depositors. |
|  [version](./lib-ethers.bitcoinsmoneypconnection.version.md) | string | Version of the Moneyp contracts (Git commit hash). |
